title: Celebrating the Passover and God’s Guidance
summary: Numbers 9 recounts the celebration of the second Passover and provides a provision for those who were unclean during the first. It also describes how God guided Israel through the wilderness by a cloud over the tabernacle.

faq.question: What if someone was unclean during Passover?
faq.answer: They could celebrate it a month later to remain part of God's covenant community.

faq.question: How did the Israelites know when to travel?
faq.answer: They followed the movement of the cloud over the tabernacle—when it lifted, they set out.
